general.pageTitle: Welcome to Philips automotive product authenticity

index.p1: At Philips we care about your safety and satisfaction. Therefore we want to help you to ensure you buy a genuine Philips product.
index.p2: To guarantee the authenticity of our products, they are put into genuine Philips packaging equipped with an authenticity label.
index.p3: By entering the provided label ID, you can check the product authenticity at any time.
index.formEnterDigi: Please enter the 16 digits on the label after scratching
index.formEnterFromImage: Please enter the 6 characters from the image
index.formErrorMsg: Re-enter the 6 characters from the image

duplicate.labelIsValidBold: this means that your product is genuine.
duplicate.labelIsValidDetail: Label ID is valid, this means that your product is genuine. But if the same code has been checked 5 times or more, Itâ€™s highly probable that a duplicated code is being used. Please contact your local shop to reconfirm that the product is genuine.

invalid.labelIsInvalidBold: there is a highly probable that your product is fake.
invalid.pleaseContact: Please contact your local shop to get a genuine product.
invalid.pleaseKeyIn: Please key in CODE again to ensure correct entry. Further rejection of correct code entry may indicate that the product is counterfeit.
